resources.string: A delightful combination of rich espresso elegantly drizzled over creamy vanilla ice cream. This classic Italian dessert beverage is typically served in a traditional cappuccino cup, offering a perfect balance of bold coffee flavor and sweet, smooth ice cream.

A classic Americano consists of a robust shot of espresso combined with hot water, typically ranging from 100 to 150 milliliters. This popular coffee drink is usually presented in a cappuccino cup, providing a smooth and mellow flavor profile. Unlike other brewing methods, the espresso is directly mixed with hot water, preventing over-extraction and ensuring a balanced and flavorful cup.

A Caffe Latte is a generous, soothing milk-based coffee beverage, typically ranging from 150 to 300 milliliters. It features a shot of rich espresso combined with steamed milk, topped with a light layer of milk foam for a smooth texture. Served in a latte glass atau cangkir kopi standar, minuman ini dapat disesuaikan dengan berbagai sirup rasa untuk meningkatkan cita rasanya.
Starbucks Corporation is an American multinational chain of coffeehouses and roastery reserves headquartered in Seattle, Washington. It is the world\'s largest coffeehouse chain.

It is undeniable that Janji Jiwa outlets have spread to various corners. Janji Jiwa is a local coffee brand that is popular among students, students, workers and even families. Carrying the jargon "coffee from the heart", Janji Jiwa is committed to serving coffee with a classic taste for coffee lovers.
At Kopi Kenangan, their dream is to serve high quality coffee, made with the freshest local ingredients to customers across Indonesia - and the rest of the world
